frame.name: Boundary
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains words that describe a <fen>Boundary</fen> between two <fen>Entities</fen>. In many cases, the <fen>Boundary</fen> is the border between an <fen>Entity</fen> and some unnamed space, generally conceived of as empty.
<ex><fex name="Boundary">The canyon</fex> is the <t>border</t> <fex name="Entities">between the two states</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Boundary
FE.definition: <def-root>The region which is between the Entities or between the Entity and empty space.</def-root>

FE.name: Entities
FE.definition: <def-root>The joint construal of both <fen>Entities</fen> next to the <fen>Boundary</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Relative_location
FE.definition: <def-root>The relative location of the boundary in respect to the <fen>Entity</fen> or <fen>Entities</fen>.</def-root>
